text: Wagner Pereira Cardozo, best known as Amaral (born 16 October 1966 in São Paulo, Brazil) is a former Brazilian football striker who currently coaches Japanese international high-school football club in the Gyosei International School, as U-18 team. == Club career statistics == |- |1992||rowspan="7"|Tokyo Gas||rowspan="7"|Football League||16||7||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||16||7 |- |1993||17||8||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||17||8 |- |1994||30||20||3||1||colspan="2"|-||33||21 |- |1995||28||16||1||0||colspan="2"|-||29||16 |- |1996||25||17||3||5||colspan="2"|-||28||22 |- |1997||25||18||0||0||colspan="2"|-||25||18 |- |1998||24||15||3||2||colspan="2"|-||27||17 |- |1999||rowspan="5"|Tokyo||J.
